sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, Typography, Button, Box, Chip, Alert, Dialog, DialogTitle, DialogContent, DialogActions, List, ListItem, ListItemText, IconButton, Tooltip, Grid, CircularProgress, LinearProgress, Divider } from '@mui/material'; import { AccountBalanceWallet, Link as LinkIcon, LinkOff, Refresh, Info, ContentCopy, OpenInNew, CheckCircle, Pending, Error, Analytics, Storage, Speed, EmojiEvents, Warning, Nature } from '@mui/icons-material'; import { useBlockchain } from '../contexts/BlockchainContext'; const BlockchainStatus = ({ projectData, aiAnalysis, blockchainData }) => { const { isConnected, account, networkInfo, carbonBalance, contractAddresses, hasMetaMask, loading, error, canConnect, needsMetaMask, initializeBlockchain, disconnect, refreshUserData, formatAddress } = useBlockchain(); const [showDetails, setShowDetails] = useState(false); const [refreshing, setRefreshing] = useState(false); // Handle connect button click const handleConnect = async () => { await initializeBlockchain(); }; // Handle refresh const handleRefresh = async () => { setRefreshing(true); await refreshUserData(); setRefreshing(false); }; // Copy to clipboard const copyToClipboard = (text) => { navigator.clipboard.writeText(text); }; // Open in block explorer const openInExplorer = (address) => { window.open(`https://amoy.polygonscan.com/address/${address}`, '_blank'); }; const getStatusColor = (score) => { if (score >= 85) return 'success'; if (score >= 70) return 'warning'; if (score >= 55) return 'info'; return 'error'; }; const getStatusIcon = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'approved': return ; case 'requires_review': return ; case 'needs_improvement': return ; default: return ; } }; const getCategoryDescription = (category) => { switch (category) { case 'excellent': return 'Outstanding project quality with comprehensive data'; case 'good': return 'Good project quality meeting all requirements'; case 'acceptable': return 'Acceptable project quality with minor improvements needed'; case 'poor': return 'Project quality needs significant improvement'; default: return 'Project quality assessment pending'; } }; // Render MetaMask installation prompt if (needsMetaMask) { return ( 🦊 MetaMask Required MetaMask is required for blockchain features. Please install MetaMask browser extension. ); } return ( <> {/* Wallet Connection Status */} Blockchain Wallet {loading ? ( ) : ( : } /> )} {isConnected && account && ( copyToClipboard(account)} clickable /> )} {canConnect && ( )} {isConnected && ( <> {refreshing ? : } setShowDetails(true)} size="small" > )} {error && ( {error} )} {isConnected && ( {carbonBalance} Carbon Credits {networkInfo?.chainId || 'Unknown'} Chain ID {networkInfo?.blockNumber || 'Unknown'} Block Number {networkInfo?.gasPrice || 'Unknown'} Gas Price )} {/* Project Status & Analysis (only show if project data is provided) */} {projectData && ( 🔗 Project Blockchain Status {/* Overall Project Status */} {getStatusIcon(projectData.current_status)} Project ID: {projectData.project_id} Status: {projectData.current_status.replace('_', ' ').toUpperCase()} {/* AI Analysis Results */} {aiAnalysis && ( 🤖 AI Verification Analysis Overall Score {aiAnalysis.overall_score}/100 Category: {aiAnalysis.category || 'Unknown'} {getCategoryDescription(aiAnalysis.category)} Detailed Scores {aiAnalysis.detailed_scores && Object.entries(aiAnalysis.detailed_scores).map(([key, scoreData]) => ( {key.replace('_', ' ').replace(/\b\w/g, l => l.toUpperCase())} {typeof scoreData === 'object' ? scoreData.score : scoreData}/100 ))} {/* Ecosystem Assessment */} {aiAnalysis.ecosystem_assessment && ( }> Ecosystem Assessment: {aiAnalysis.ecosystem_assessment.ecosystem_type} Location Suitable: {aiAnalysis.ecosystem_assessment.location_suitable ? 'Yes' : 'No'} | Expected Carbon Range: {aiAnalysis.ecosystem_assessment.expected_carbon_range?.join('-')} tCO2/ha/year )} {/* Recommendations */} {aiAnalysis.recommendations && aiAnalysis.recommendations.length > 0 && ( }> Recommendations: {aiAnalysis.recommendations.map((rec, index) => ( ))} )} {/* Warnings */} {aiAnalysis.warnings && aiAnalysis.warnings.length > 0 && ( }> Warnings: {aiAnalysis.warnings.map((warning, index) => ( ))} )} )} {/* Blockchain Registration Status */} ⛓️ Blockchain Registration {blockchainData && blockchainData.registered ? ( }> Successfully Registered on Polygon Amoy Testnet Blockchain ID: {blockchainData.blockchain_id} {blockchainData.tx_hash && ( Transaction Hash: {blockchainData.tx_hash} )} Your project data is now permanently stored on the blockchain ) : ( }> Blockchain Registration Pending Projects with scores ≥70 are automatically registered on blockchain. {projectData.verification_score < 70 && ' Improve your project quality to enable blockchain registration.' } )} {/* Performance Metrics */} 🎯 Performance Overview IPFS Storage {projectData.blockchain?.registered ? 'Active' : 'Pending'} Blockchain {blockchainData?.registered ? 'Registered' : 'Pending'} AI Score {aiAnalysis?.category || 'Pending'} Status {projectData.current_status.replace('_', ' ')} )} {/* Details Dialog */} setShowDetails(false)} maxWidth="md" fullWidth > 🔗 Blockchain Connection Details {isConnected ? ( {account} copyToClipboard(account)} > openInExplorer(account)} > } /> {Object.entries(contractAddresses).map(([name, address]) => ( {name}: {address} copyToClipboard(address)} > openInExplorer(address)} > ))} } /> ) : ( Connect your wallet to view blockchain details. )} ); }; export default BlockchainStatus;
